00036 namespace network {
00037   namespace client {
00038 
00039     // generic base class for connecting to a broadcaster
00040     template<typename PROCESSOR>
00041     class client : public client_base {
00042     public:
00043       client(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00044         : client_base(network::get_io_service(), config)
00045         , p_(config) {}
00046 
00047       virtual ~client() {
00048         LOG_INFO("~client: close");
00049       }
00050 
00051       virtual void process(data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00052                            data_buffer_type::const_iterator end) {
00053         //     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("client::process: h='%s', length=%d")
00054         //                  % get_header()
00055         //                  % std::distance(begin,end)));    
00056         processor::service_base::sptr sp(service_net::make(get_header(), get_directory()));
00057         p_.process(sp, begin, end);
00058       }
00059 
00060       virtual void directory_update(const broadcaster::directory& new_directory) {
00061         // NOP
00062       }
00063 
00064     protected:
00065     private:
00066       PROCESSOR p_;
00067     } ;
00068 
00069   } // namespace client
00070 } // namespace network
00071 #endif // _CLIENT_HPP_cm121230_
